channel.title: Private Peaceful
channel.description:
Awesome, I haven't finished it so far, but it's actually quite interesting. If any of you have read this, rate it from 1-10. I'll add an extract from the book at the bottom. And hopefully a video. Here's what I know at the moment: - There's a boy - Flashback to when he was little - His father dies, and apparantly it was "his" fault - He joins school - Talks about his father wanting to be a bird. :palm: me and my terrible reviews.
... couldn't find an extract. Video:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PUoA8njBZVA

item.title: Private Peaceful
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Awesome, I haven’t finished it so far, but it’s actually quite interesting. If any of you have read this, rate it from 1-10. I’ll add an extract from the book at the bottom. And hopefully a video.
Here’s what I know at the moment:

  • There’s a boy
  • Flashback to when he was little
  • His father dies, and apparantly it was “his” fault
  • He joins school
  • Talks about his father wanting to be a bird.
    :palm: me and my terrible reviews.
